Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory226.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the surreal projection of M.I.N.D. space, you see another Amberia—the real Amberia.'}
{3: "Guided by the narwhal's voice, you see the true master of the bionics, Amberia, in the deepest recesses of her mind, festered by nightmares."}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "Who is it...? You're not Derek? Who are you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: '【kuroname】, commandant from Babylonia.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'I know why you are here, but I decline your request.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "I won't stop the bionics... And I won't sleep again. I don't want to dream anymore.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "I'm going outside. I'm going to open my eyes and escape from this place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Are you not going berserk?', 3: '11', 4: 'If you promise not to hurt anyone else.', 5: '13'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Berserk... You call this fear of mine, berserk?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "I'm just trying to protect myself! Protect myself from those people!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'Hurt others... No, I never wanted to hurt anyone. I just wanted the ones that hurt me gone...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "You'd do the same in my shoes. I'm going to eliminate the ARU and everything that stands in my way. That way, I won't be imprisoned in this ice cave ever again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: "I don't want anyone to call me a monster ever again!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Amberia', 3: 'So... As long as you have the code, 【kuroname】, I will never let you leave this place!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory224.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Ngh... Where am I...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Looks like Commandant's succeeded. The pain in my M.I.N.D. is easing...", 4: '1'}

{3: "During Rosetta's defensive bout, she suddenly finds a massive weight lifted from her M.I.N.D. A glance at the Polar Soldier, silent in the rear, tells her that 【kuroname】 has entered the depths of Amberia's M.I.N.D."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'How did you squirm out of my hold? Wait, why is my frame so slow!', 4: '1', 6: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Thank the commandant. Also, weren't you just in misery as well?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Hmph... That was just pain caused by M.I.N.D. integration. Once it is complete, Amberia will no longer exist, and I can perfectly control this frame!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Then you'll become the monster in Amberia's stead. Won't you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: '...I am not a—MONSTER!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryHitNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "Verbal and armed exchanges fly in the air. With Amberia's M.I.N.D. integration paused, Rosetta can finally make use of her lightning-fast speed and destructive power to gain an upper hand."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "If you're not a monster, why do you want to become Amberia and destroy your home?!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Take a look at yourself...! Why would you protect those bastards!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Because I love this snowland; the feeling of snow beneath my feet... I want to be proud of this place.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I've always believed that the ARU can change. I thought I could find this change through the outside world.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But when I got out, I realized... We ourselves, have to be the change we want to see.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Putting the past to rest to prevent another tragedy like you and me—that is my answer!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Rosetta throws a thrust at Amberia's upper body, but before it could connect, Atiel regains control of her frame and swipes Rosetta away."}
{3: 'Rosetta is knocked to the ground. Her light wings have softened the impact, but she still crashes into an icicle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Always going on about your luck. I am—Amberia is—the actual unlucky one!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Indeed. By unlucky, I meant you two.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I've always thought the entire world was down on its luck. That's why the Punishing Virus broke out. That's why I have no choice but to defeat you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Because we're all marred by misfortune, that's why we all suffer. This is why we are bound...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Amberia (Atiel)', 3: 'Rosetta... Spare the talk. Do you think you can defeat Amberia, the "perfect" humanoid-hybrid Construct?!', 4: '1'}
{3: "The particles emitted by Rosetta's light wings disperse, forming a thin reflective film over the fractured ice."}
{3: "Rosetta's mixed expression, taken by hints of sadness, can be seen on the glinting ice."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'm not just defeating you! I'm going forward!", 4: '1'}
